27.verse: Jesus Tell How He Goin Mahke - Den Jesus tell, “Right now I feel all funny kine inside. Wat I goin say? ‘Fadda, no let me mahke right now’? No way I goin say dat! Dass why I wen come hea, so I can mahke.

28.verse: I say dis: ‘Fadda, let um happen, so everybody can know how awesome you stay.’ ” Den one voice from da sky wen say, “I wen show dem I stay awesome awready, an I goin show um one mo time.”

29.verse: Da peopo dat wen stand dea an hear um, wen say, “Eh! Get thunder!” Da odda peopo wen say, “Nah, az was one angel messenja guy from da Boss dat wen talk to him.”

30.verse: Jesus tell dem, “Dis voice not fo me, but fo you guys.

31.verse: Now da peopo inside dis world goin stand in front God da Judge, an God goin throw out da Bad Guy dat stay in charge a da peopo all ova da world.

32.verse: Wen dey lift me up from da groun fo kill me, den I goin bring everybody by me.”

33.verse: (He wen say dat fo show dem how he goin mahke.)

34.verse: Da peopo tell him, “We wen hear from Godʼs Rules dat da Christ Guy goin live foeva. Den how come you say, ‘Dey goin take me, da Guy Dass Fo Real, an lift me up from da groun fo kill me’? Who dis Guy Dass Fo Real dat you talking bout?”

35.verse: Jesus wen tell dem, “Me, I jalike da light fo you guys. Ony litto wile mo da light goin stay hea wit you guys. Live da right way now wen get light still yet, cuz no good da dark pio da light you get inside you. Whoeva walk aroun inside da dark, dey donno wea dey going.

36.verse: Right now, I stay hea wit you guys. I jalike da light fo you guys. So go trus me. Den you guys can come da kine peopo dat know wea dey going cuz dey get da light inside.” Jesus say dat. Den he go way from da peopo so he can stay by himself.

37.verse: Da Jewish Peopo No Trus Jesus - No matta Jesus wen do plenny awesome stuff in front da peopo fo show who him, dey still yet no trus him.

38.verse: Jalike da guy Isaiah wen say, dat wen talk fo God long time ago, “Eh Boss! No mo nobody wen trus wat us guys wen say! Wen you wen show yoa power, nobody see notting!”

39.verse: Az why da Jewish peopo no can trus God nowdays, jalike Isaiah wen say one nodda time,

40.verse: “God wen make um so dey no can see, An make um hard head, So dey no like see wit dea eyes, No like undastan wit dea head, No like change an come by me, Cuz dey no like fo me fo make um come good.”

41.verse: Isaiah wen say dat cuz he wen see how awesome Jesus stay, an he wen tell wat goin happen wit Jesus.

42.verse: Plenny Jewish main leada guys wen trus Jesus, but dey no like tell everybody, cuz dey scared da Pharisee guys goin throw um outa da Jewish church.

43.verse: Cuz da leada guys, dey like da peopo talk good bout dem, mo den dey like God talk good bout um.

44.verse: Wat Jesus Say Show Wat Kine Peopo Dem - Jesus wen talk loud an say, “Whoeva trus me, he no trus ony me, but he trus da One dat wen send me hea too.

45.verse: Whoeva see me, he see da One dat wen send me hea too.

46.verse: I wen come jalike da light inside da world, so dat whoeva trus me, dey no goin stay dark inside.

47.verse: Whoeva hear wat I say an no do um, I no goin punish dem. I neva come fo punish da peopo inside da world. Me, I wen come fo take um outa da bad kine stuff dey doing.

48.verse: Whoeva no take me an wat I say, dat guy goin get one nodda judge. In da end time wen da world goin pau, all da stuff I wen say goin show how dat guy stay.

49.verse: Cuz I neva talk by myself, but my Fadda who wen send me wen tell me everyting he like me fo say.

50.verse: I know dat wat da Fadda tell us fo do show everybody how dey can come alive foeva fo real kine. So everyting I say, dass jalike my Fadda wen tell me.”

1.verse: Jesus Wash His Guys Feet - Was jus befo da Passova time. Jesus wen know dat was time fo him fo go outa dis world, an go by his Fadda. He everytime get love an aloha fo his peopo dat stay inside da world, an he get love an aloha fo dem all da way.

2.verse: Jesus dem was eating da Passova dinna. An da Devil wen awready make Judas, Simon Iscariotʼs boy, tink dat he like set Jesus up.

3.verse: Jesus know dat his Fadda wen give him all da power ova everyting. He know he wen come from God an now he going back to God.

4.verse: So Jesus wen stand up from da table, take off his robe, an put one towel aroun his waist.

5.verse: Den he wen pour water inside one small wash tub, an wen start fo wash his guys feet, first one guy, den da odda. An den he dry um wit da towel he wen get aroun his waist.

6.verse: Den he wen go by Simon Peter. An Peter wen aks him, “Eh, Boss! Wat you doing? You goin wash my feet?”

7.verse: Jesus tell him, “You no undastan how come I doing dis now, but bumbye you goin undastan um.”

8.verse: Peter tell him, “No way you eva goin wash my feet!” Den Jesus tell him, “If I no wash you, den you no can be my guy.”

9.verse: Den Simon Peter tell him, “Kay den, Boss. No wash ony my feet. Wash my hands an my head too!”

10.verse: Jesus tell him, “Whoeva wen bafe, dey ony need wash dea feet. Dea body stay clean awready. You guys stay clean inside, but not all you guys.”

11.verse: (Cuz Jesus know awready who goin set him up. Dass why he say, “All you guys not clean.”)

12.verse: Afta Jesus wen wash dea feet, he put on his robe an go back to da table. Den he aks um, “Eh, you guys undastan how come I wen wash you guys feet?

13.verse: You guys call me ‘Teacha’ an ‘Boss.’ Dass good, cuz dass who me.

14.verse: I you guys Boss an Teacha, yeah? an I wen wash you guys feet. Kay den. You guys suppose to wash each oddaʼs feet too.

15.verse: I wen show you guys wat fo do, cuz jalike I wen do fo you guys, you guys suppose to do too.

16.verse: Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: Da slave guy not mo importan den his boss. An da messenja guy not mo importan den da guy dat wen send him.

17.verse: You guys know all dis stuffs. So, if you guys do um, you guys goin stay good inside.

18.verse: “I not talking bout all you guys. I know da guys I wen pick. But gotta happen jalike da Bible say from befo time, ‘One guy dat wen eat wit me, like go agains me.’

19.verse: I stay telling you guys dis now, befo he do um, so wen he do um, you guys goin know fo shua dat I Godʼs Spesho Guy.

20.verse: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: Whoeva stick wit da guy I send, dey stick wit me too. An whoeva stick wit me, dey stick wit da One who wen send me too.”

21.verse: Dey Goin Set Up Jesus fo Mahke - Afta Jesus wen say dat, he come all funny kine inside. He tell da guys he teaching, “Dis fo shua wat I telling you guys: One a you guys goin set me up fo mahke.”

22.verse: His guys wen look at each odda, an dey no can figga who he talking bout.

23.verse: Had one a Jesus guys was sitting by him at da table. Jesus get plenny love an aloha fo him.

24.verse: So Simon Peter nod da head at da guy an say, “Eh! Try find out who he talking bout.”

25.verse: So da guy wen move mo close an aks Jesus, “Eh, Boss! Who da guy?”

26.verse: Jesus say, “I goin take one piece bread, dip um inside da sauce, an give um to da guy.” So he take da bread, dip um inside, an give um to Judas, Simon Iscariotʼs boy.

27.verse: Judas wen take da bread, an right den an dea, da Devil take ova him. Den Jesus say, “Hurry up an go do wat you goin do!”

28.verse: But da odda guys sitting dea neva undastan how come Jesus wen tell him dat.

29.verse: Some a Jesus guys was tinking dat Jesus telling Judas, “Go get wat we need fo da Passova,” o “Go give someting to da peopo dat no mo notting.” Dey tinking lidat cuz Judas stay in charge a da money fo all da guys.

30.verse: So afta Judas take da bread, he go outside quick. Was nite time.

31.verse: Da New Ting Dey Gotta Do - Afta Judas go way, Jesus say, “I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Now everybody goin see how awesome I stay. An from dat, dey goin find out how awesome God stay.

32.verse: I goin show how awesome God stay, an he goin make me awesome too, cuz I stay tight wit him. An he goin do um right away.

33.verse: Eh guys! I get plenny love an aloha fo you guys! But I goin stay wit you guys ony litto wile moa. Den you guys goin look fo me, but jalike I wen tell da Jewish leada guys, I telling you guys now, ‘Da place wea I going, you guys no can go dea.’

34.verse: “I give you guys one new ting you gotta do: Show love an aloha fo each odda. Jus like I get love an aloha fo you guys, dass how you guys gotta get love an aloha fo each odda.

35.verse: If all you guys get love an aloha fo each odda, den everybody goin know you my guys.”

36.verse: Bumbye Peter Goin Say He Donno Jesus - Simon Peter aks him, “Eh, Boss, wea you going?” Jesus tell him, “Da place I going, you no can go dea now, but bumbye you going dea.”

37.verse: Peter tell him, “Eh, Boss, how come I no can go wit you now? I stay ready fo mahke fo you!”

38.verse: Jesus tell him, “Fo real? You tink you stay ready fo mahke fo me? Dass right! But I tell you dis too: Befo da roosta make noise early today, you goin say three times dat you donno who me!”

1.verse: Ony By Jesus We Can Go To Da Fadda - “No need you guys come all bodda inside yoa heart. Trus God, an trus me too.

2.verse: Inside my Faddaʼs house, get plenny place fo stay. If neva have, I wen tell you guys awready. I going ova dea fo make you guys place ready.

3.verse: Afta I go an make da place ready, I goin come back, an take you guys ova dea wit me, so da place I stay, you guys goin stay dea too.

4.verse: Da place I going, you guys know how fo go ova dea.”

5.verse: Thomas tell um, “Eh Boss! Us guys, we donno wea you going. How we goin know how fo go ova dea?”

6.verse: Jesus tell um, “No mo odda guy can bring peopo to da Fadda, ony me. I bring peopo to um, jalike I da road. I da guy who get da trut. I da guy dat make da peopo come alive fo real kine.

7.verse: You guys know me, so dass mean you guys goin know my Fadda. An from now, you guys know him, an see him.”

8.verse: Philip tell um, “Eh Boss, show us yoa Fadda, an dass nuff fo us guys.”

9.verse: Jesus tell him, “I stay wit you guys long time, an you still yet donno who me, Philip? Whoeva wen see me, dey wen see my Fadda. So how come you say, ‘Show us yoa Fadda’?

10.verse: You no trus me, o wat, wen I say dat I stay tight wit my Fadda, an he stay tight wit me? Da stuff I telling you guys, all dat no come from me, come from my Fadda. He stay tight wit me, an he da One dat stay doing all dis kine stuff.

11.verse: Trus me wen I say dat I stay tight wit my Fadda an he stay tight wit me. If you guys no can believe dat, den trus me cuz a da stuff I stay doing.

12.verse: “Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: Whoeva trus me, dey goin do da same kine stuff I do. An dey goin do even mo betta stuff, cuz I going by my Fadda.

13.verse: Wateva you guys aks me fo do cuz you my guys, I goin do um. Den everybody can know how awesome my Fadda stay, cuz I his Boy, an I show dem how awesome he stay.

14.verse: Wateva you guys aks me fo do cuz you my guys, I goin do um fo you.

15.verse: Jesus Tell Dat Godʼs Spesho Spirit Goin Come - “If you guys get love an aloha fo me, you goin do wat I tell you guys fo do.

16.verse: I goin aks my Fadda, an he goin give you guys one nodda One fo kokua you guys. An dat One goin stay wit you guys foeva.

17.verse: Dass Godʼs Spirit dat teach you guys da trut. But da peopo inside da world no like take him, cuz dey no see him, an dey donno him. You guys know him, cuz he stay by you guys, an he goin stay tight wit you guys.

18.verse: “I no goin leave you guys all alone. I goin come back by you guys.

19.verse: Litto wile moa, da peopo inside da world no goin see me. But you guys goin see me. Cuz I goin come back alive, dass why you guys goin come alive fo real kine.

20.verse: Wen I come back alive, you guys goin know fo shua dat I stay tight wit my Fadda, an you guys stay tight wit me, an I stay tight wit you guys.

21.verse: “Whoeva take wat I tell um fo do, an do um, dass da ones dat get love an aloha fo me. My Fadda goin get love an aloha fo dem, an I goin get love an aloha fo um, an I goin show um who me fo real kine.”

22.verse: Had one nodda guy name Judas, not da Iscariot guy. He wen aks Jesus, “Boss, how come you goin show us guys who you fo real kine, an not show da odda peopo inside da world?”

23.verse: Jesus wen tell him, “Whoeva get love an aloha fo me, dey goin do wat I tell um. My Fadda goin get love an aloha fo dem too. Den me an my Fadda going by dem, an jalike we goin make house wit dem togedda.

24.verse: Whoeva no mo love an aloha fo me, dey no goin do wat I say. All da stuff you wen hear me tell, dat no come from me, come from my Fadda who wen send me.

25.verse: “I wit you guys still yet, az why I stay telling you guys all dis stuff now.

26.verse: My Fadda, bumbye he goin send you guys his Good an Spesho Spirit fo kokua you guys fo me. He goin teach you guys everyting, an help you guys rememba all da stuff I wen tell you guys awready.

27.verse: “Wen I go way, I goin make you guys hearts rest inside, da kine rest dat ony I can give. All da stuff inside da world no can make you guys rest inside lidat. No let yoa heart come all funny kine inside! No scared!

28.verse: You guys wen hear me say, ‘I going way from you guys, an I goin come back by you guys.’ So, no feel bad. If you guys wen get love an aloha fo me, den you guys stay good inside, cuz I going by my Fadda. Cuz my Fadda, he mo importan den me.

29.verse: I wen tell you guys all dis stuff befo da ting happen. So wen da ting happen, you guys goin trus me.

30.verse: I ony goin talk to you guys litto wile moa, cuz da Devil stay coming. Fo now, he in charge a da peopo inside dis world, but he no mo power ova me.

31.verse: But no matta he coming, cuz I goin do wat my Fadda wen tell me fo do. Dat goin show da peopo inside da world dat I get love an aloha fo my Fadda.” “Come on! We going!”

1.verse: Jesus, Jalike Da Grape Vine - “Listen up. I da guy dat you guys stay tight wit. I jalike da grape vine, but me, I fo real kine. My Fadda, he jalike da farma guy dat take care da grape vine.

2.verse: All da peopo dat say dey stay tight wit me, but dey no do notting, my Fadda take um off, jalike da grape farma guy take off all da branches dat no mo fruit. An all da peopo dat stay tight wit me, he take away da junk kine stuff from inside dem, jalike wen da grape farma guy trim da branches so dey get plenny fruit.

3.verse: “From da stuff I telling you, you guys stay clean inside awready, jalike da branches dey wen trim.

4.verse: Come tight wit me, jalike I stay tight wit you guys. Da branch no can make fruit if no stay tight wit da vine. Same ting, you guys no can do notting if you guys no stay tight wit me.

5.verse: “Me, I jalike da grape vine, an you guys jalike da branches. Whoeva come tight wit me awready, an I stay tight wit dem, dey goin be jalike one branch dat get plenny fruit. Cuz you guys no can do notting if you no stay tight wit me.

6.verse: Whoeva no stay tight wit me, dey jalike one branch dat stay no good. Dass da kine branch peopo throw out, an da branch dry up. Den dey go get all da odda dry branches, an throw um inside da fire fo burn.

7.verse: If you guys stay tight wit me, an stick wit da tings I stay telling you guys, den you guys can aks God fo wateva you guys like, an he goin do um fo you guys.

8.verse: “Dis how everybody goin know how awesome my Fadda stay, if you guys stay doing plenny good kine stuff, jalike da grape branches dat give plenny fruit. Dass how you guys goin show dat you my guys.

9.verse: “Jalike da Fadda get love an aloha fo me, dass how I get love an aloha fo you guys. Hang in dea an stay tight wit me, so I can give you guys my love an aloha.

10.verse: If you guys stay doing wat I tell you guys fo do, den you guys goin hang in dea an stay tight wit me fo shua, an I goin give you guys my love an aloha. Jalike I do wat my Fadda tell me fo do, an he stay give me plenny love an aloha.

11.verse: “I wen tell you guys all dis stuff awready, so you guys can stay good inside yoa hearts, jalike I stay good inside. Den you guys goin stay good inside to da max.

12.verse: Dis wat I tell you guys fo do: Get love an aloha fo each odda, jalike I stay get love an aloha fo you guys.

13.verse: No mo nobody get mo love an aloha fo da odda guy, den da guy dat goin go mahke fo his friends.

14.verse: You guys stay my friends, if you guys do da stuff I telling you guys fo do.

15.verse: I no goin call you guys my worka guys no moa, cuz da worka guy no undastan wat his boss stay doing. But I call you guys my friends, cuz I wen tell you guys everyting dat my Fadda wen tell me.

16.verse: You guys neva pick me. I wen pick you guys, an give you dis job: go do plenny good stuff dat stay long time, jalike one grape vine dat give plenny good fruit, long time. Den, anyting you aks my Fadda fo do cuz you my guys, he goin do um fo you.

17.verse: So den, dis wat I tell you guys fo do: stay get love an aloha fo each odda.

18.verse: Da Peopo Inside da World Hate Jesus Peopo - “If da peopo hea inside da world hate you guys, rememba dis: was me dey wen hate first.

19.verse: If you guys wen do same ting jalike da odda guys inside da world, dey wen love you guys, cuz you guys jalike dem. But, you guys no stay jalike dem. I wen pick you guys fo come outa da bad kine stuff inside dis world. Dass why dey hate you guys.

20.verse: “Rememba wat I wen tell you guys. Da worka guy not mo betta den his boss. If dey make me suffa, dey goin make you guys suffa too. If dey wen do wat I wen tell um fo do, dey goin do wat you guys tell um fo do too.

21.verse: But dey goin do all dis stuff to you guys, jus cuz you my guys, an dey donno da One who wen send me hea.

22.verse: If I neva come an talk to dem, dey neva tink dey doing bad kine stuff. But now, dey no can go do bad kine stuff an den say, ‘Eh, us guys neva know was bad!’

23.verse: Whoeva hate me, dey hate my Fadda too.

24.verse: I wen do da kine stuff in front dem dat no odda guy wen eva do. If I neva do dat, den dey neva know dey doing da bad kine stuff. But now dey wen see me an my Fadda, an dey hate us both.

25.verse: But all dis stuff wen happen, jalike dea Rules say, ‘Dey wen hate me fo notting.’

26.verse: “Da Kokua Guy goin come. He da Spirit dat make you guys know da trut, an he come from my Fadda. Wen I go to my Fadda, I goin send his Spirit by you guys. He goin tell you guys wat he know bout me.

27.verse: Same ting, you guys goin tell wat you know bout me too, cuz you guys wen stay wit me from da start.”

1.verse: “I wen tell you guys dis stuff awready, cuz no good bumbye you guys no stick wit me no moa.

2.verse: Da Jewish peopo goin throw you guys outa dea churches. An even goin get one time wen whoeva kill you guys goin tink dey doing someting good fo God.

3.verse: Dey goin make lidat to you guys cuz dey donno my Fadda an dey donno me.

4.verse: I wen tell you guys dis stuff too, so wen da time come, you guys goin rememba dat I wen tell you guys bout um. I neva tell you guys dis stuff befo, cuz I was wit you guys.

5.verse: Wat Godʼs Spirit Do - “But now I going to da One dat wen send me. But still yet, you guys no even aks me wea I going.

6.verse: I wen tell you guys dis stuff awready. Dass why you guys stay all sad an crying inside.

7.verse: Dis da trut, wat I stay telling you guys: Mo betta fo you guys if I go way. Cuz if I no go way, da One who goin kokua you guys no goin come hea. But if I go way, den I goin send him to you guys.

8.verse: “Wen da Kokua Guy come, he goin show da peopo inside da world how dey mess up. Dat mean, da Kokua Guy goin show peopo dat dey do bad kine stuff, an dat dey no do wat stay right, an dat God goin be dea Judge.

9.verse: He goin show dem dat dey do bad kine stuff, cuz dey no like trus me.

10.verse: He goin show dem dat dey no do wat stay right, cuz I going to my Fadda, an den you guys no goin see me no moa.

11.verse: He goin show dem dat God goin be dea Judge, cuz God awready wen judge da main leada fo dis world, da Devil.

12.verse: “I still yet get plenny mo stuff fo tell you guys, but dass mo den you guys can handle right now.

13.verse: Wen da Spirit come dat make you guys know da trut, he goin show you guys how fo do da true stuff. He no goin talk by himself, but he goin tell wat my Fadda wen tell him. An he goin tell you guys bout da stuff dat goin happen bumbye.

14.verse: Dass how he goin show how awesome I stay, cuz he goin take all da true stuff bout me an show you guys wat all dat mean.

15.verse: Everyting my Fadda get, dass mines too. Dass why I wen say, Godʼs Spirit goin take all da true stuff bout me, an show you guys wat dat mean.

16.verse: You Guys Goin Cry Inside, An Afta Dat, You Goin Stay Good Inside - “In litto wile, you guys no goin see me. Den litto wile moa, you guys goin see me.”

17.verse: Den some a da guys he wen teach wen tell each odda, “Eh, wass he talking bout? He say, ‘In litto wile, you guys no goin see me. Den litto wile moa, you guys goin see me.’ An how come he say, ‘Cuz I going to my Fadda’?”

18.verse: So dey wen say, “Wass dis he mean, ‘In litto wile’? We donno wat he talking bout.”

19.verse: Jesus know dey like aks him question, so he tell um, “I wen say, ‘In litto wile you guys no goin see me. Den litto wile moa, an you guys goin see me.’ Dat wat you aksing each odda bout?

20.verse: Dass good you aks! An I like tell you guys dis too: you guys goin cry an come sad inside, but da peopo hea inside da world, dey goin stay good inside. You guys goin be crying inside, but afta, you guys goin stay good inside.

21.verse: You know, wen one wahine goin born one baby, she sad cuz she stay suffa. But afta da baby born, she no tink bout dat no moa. Den she stay good inside cuz one baby wen born hea inside dis world.

22.verse: Same ting wit you guys: Now, you guys stay sad an crying inside, but bumbye I goin see you guys again, an den you guys goin stay good inside. Dat time, no goin get nobody can make you feel bad again.

23.verse: “Wen dat time come, you guys no goin need aks me bout notting. Dass right! I tell you guys, wateva you guys aks my Fadda fo do cuz you my guys, he goin do um fo you guys.

24.verse: Befo now, you guys neva aks my Fadda fo do notting cuz you my guys. Aks now, an you guys goin get um, so you guys can stay good inside to da max.

25.verse: Jesus, He Da Winna - “Till now I wen teach you guys wit stories. Da time goin come wen I no goin teach you guys wit stories lidat no moa. Den I goin tell you strait out bout my Fadda.

26.verse: Wen dat time come, you guys goin aks my Fadda fo do stuff cuz you my guys. No need fo me aks him fo you guys.

27.verse: My Fadda, he da One dat get love an aloha fo you guys, cuz you guys get love an aloha fo me, an you stay shua dat I wen come from God.

28.verse: Befo, I wen go way from wea my Fadda stay, an wen come inside da world. Now I going outa da world, an going back to my Fadda.”

29.verse: Den da guys he teaching tell him, “Eh! Now you talking strait out, an not ony teaching wit stories!

30.verse: Now, we know fo shua dat you know everyting. You no need nobody fo aks you notting, cuz you know awready wat dey like aks an wat da answer. Dat show us dat you wen come from God.”

31.verse: Jesus tell um, “Fo real? You guys trus me now?

32.verse: You know wat? Da time goin come, an almos stay hea now, wen all you guys goin bag, an run all ova da place. Everybody goin go his own place, an I goin stay by myself. But I no stay by myself, cuz my Fadda stay wit me.

33.verse: I wen tell you guys all dis stuff so yoa hearts can rest inside, cuz you guys stay tight wit me. Da peopo inside da world goin make you guys suffa. But make strong! I da winna ova all da power inside da whole world!”

1.verse: Jesus Pray Fo His Guys - Afta Jesus wen say dat, he wen look up to da sky an say, “Fadda, time awready. Now, show da peopo how awesome I stay cuz I yoa Boy, so den I like show dem how awesome you stay.

2.verse: Cuz you wen make me in charge a da peopo all ova da world, I goin make everybody you wen give me come alive fo real kine foeva.

3.verse: Dis wat da kine life mean dat stay fo real kine foeva: dat da peopo dat get dat kine life know you, da ony God dass fo real, an dat dey know me too, Jesus Christ, da Spesho Guy You Wen Send.

4.verse: I wen show da peopo hea inside da world how awesome you stay. I wen pau do all da stuff dat you wen tell me fo do.

5.verse: Fadda, wen I wen stay by you, from befo da time wen we wen make da world, I wen stay awesome jalike you. Now I going back by you, an I like you make me awesome, same kine jalike befo time.

6.verse: “Da guys you wen give me from inside da world fo be my guys, I wen teach dem bout you, so dat dey can know you. Dey was yoa guys, an you wen give dem to me. Dey do wat you say.

7.verse: Now dey know dat everyting you teach me, wen come from you.

8.verse: Cuz I wen teach dem all da stuff dat you wen tell me, an dey wen take um. Dey know fo shua dat I wen come from you, cuz dey believe dat you wen send me hea.

9.verse: “I like pray fo dem. I no pray fo all da peopo inside da world, but ony fo da peopo dat you wen give me, cuz dey yoa guys.

10.verse: Everyting I get, dass yoas. An everyting you get, dass mines. My peopo stay showing how awesome I stay awready.

11.verse: I no goin stay inside da world no moa, cuz I coming to you. But dese guys, dey stay inside da world. Fadda, you stay spesho an good. Take care dem wit yoa power, cuz dey yoa guys, an dey get yoa name, jalike me. So den, dey goin stay tight wit each odda, jalike me an you stay tight wit each odda.

12.verse: All da time I wen stay wit dem inside da world, I wen take care dem wit yoa power. I yoa guy, an I wen help dem stay tight wit you. Nobody wen wipe out. Ony da one guy Judas, da guy dat like mess up, he wen wipe out, jalike da Bible wen say long time ago.

13.verse: “Now I goin come by you. I say dis tings hea inside da world so my peopo can stay good inside to da max, jalike me.

14.verse: I wen tell dem wat you wen say. Da peopo hea inside dis world hate dem, cuz dey no do same ting jalike da odda guys inside dis world, jalike I no do same ting jalike da odda guys inside dis world.

15.verse: I no aks you fo take dem outa da world, but fo you help dem stay away from da Bad Guy, da Devil.

16.verse: Dey no do same ting jalike da odda guys inside dis world, jalike I no do same ting jalike da odda guys inside dis world.

17.verse: “Make dem good an spesho fo you, cuz dey know wat you say, an you everytime tell da trut.

18.verse: Jalike you wen send me to da peopo inside da world, same ting, I wen send my guys to da peopo inside da world.

19.verse: Dass why I stay good an spesho fo you, so dem guys can be good an spesho fo you too. Da true stuff you say, dass wat goin make dem go all out fo you.

20.verse: “I no pray ony fo dem guys, but fo all da odda peopo dat goin trus me cuz a wat dem guys tell um.

21.verse: So dat everybody goin stay tight wit each odda, jalike you stay tight wit me, Fadda, an I stay tight wit you. I like dem stay tight wit us, so da peopo inside da world goin believe dat you da One dat wen send me hea.

22.verse: Jalike you wen show peopo how awesome I stay, I wen make dem come awesome jalike me, so dey goin stay tight wit each odda, jalike we stay tight wit each odda.

23.verse: I stay tight wit dem, an you stay tight wit me. Den dey goin stick togedda to da max. Cuz dey stick togedda, da peopo inside da world goin know dat you da One dat wen send me hea, an dat you get love an aloha fo dem guys jalike you get love an aloha fo me.

24.verse: “Fadda, I like everybody dat you wen give me be wit me wea I goin stay, cuz I like dem see how awesome I stay. Cuz you wen get love an aloha fo me, an you wen make me awesome befo we wen make da world.

25.verse: Fadda, you everytime do da right ting. But da peopo hea inside da world donno you. I know you, an my peopo, dey know dat you da One wen send me hea.

26.verse: I wen tell dem wat kine guy you, an I goin stay telling dem, cuz I like dem get da same kine love an aloha dat you get fo me, an I can stay tight wit dem.”

1.verse: Da Police Guys Grab Jesus - Wen Jesus wen pau pray, he wen go ova da Kidron Stream wit da guys he teaching, an dey wen go inside one garden wit trees.

2.verse: Judas, da guy who wen set Jesus up fo mahke, wen know da place, cuz Jesus wen go ova dea plenny times befo wit his guys.

3.verse: Da main priest guys an da Pharisee guys wen let Judas take dea army guys an police guys wit him. So Judas dem go to da garden, an dey all wen go dea togedda, wit lanterns an torches an swords.

4.verse: Jesus wen know all da stuff dat going happen to him, so he wen go by dem an aks dem, “Who you guys looking fo?”

5.verse: Dey tell him, “Jesus, da guy from Nazaret.” He tell dem, “I da guy.” Judas, da guy who wen set him up fo mahke, was right dea wit dem.

6.verse: An you know wat? Wen Jesus wen tell dem, “I da guy,” dey wen back up an wen fall down on top da groun.

7.verse: He wen aks dem again, “Who you looking fo?” Dey tell, “Jesus, da guy from Nazaret.”

8.verse: Jesus tell um, “I wen tell you, I da guy. If I da guy you looking fo, den let dese odda guys go.”

9.verse: He wen say dat fo make wat he wen say befo come true, “Fadda, Da guys you wen give me, I neva lose dem, not even one guy.”

10.verse: Simon Peter, he get one sword. He pull um out an wack one guy dat work fo da Head Priest, an cut off his right ear. Da worka guyʼs name was Malkus.

11.verse: Jesus tell Peter, “Put back yoa sword! My Fadda say I suppose to suffa all dis kine stuff, an dass wat I goin do! Jalike he give me one cup full wit da bitta kine stuff fo drink, an I goin drink da whole ting.”

12.verse: Jesus an da Head Priest Guy - Den da captain, da army guys, an da police guys from da Jewish leada guys wen take Jesus an tie him up.

13.verse: Dey wen bring Jesus by Annas first. He Kaiafas fadda-in-law. Kaiafas, he da Head Priest guy dat year.

14.verse: Kaiafas da guy wen tell da Jewish leada guys befo, “Mo betta fo you guys if one guy mahke fo all da peopo.”

15.verse: Peter Tell, “I Donno Jesus” - Simon Peter wen go wit Jesus. An anodda guy Jesus wen teach go too -- dass me. Now, da Head Priest guy know me. Dass how I wen go inside da Head Priest guyʼs yard togedda wit Jesus.

16.verse: But Peter, he stay outside by da gate. Den me, cuz I Jesus odda guy dat was dea, an da Head Priest guy know me, I wen go outside, talk to da girl dat watch da gate, an bring Peter inside.

17.verse: Den da girl dat watch da gate wen tell Peter, “You one a da guys dat bugga wen teach, yeah?” Peter say, “No way! I not!”

18.verse: Had odda worka guys an police guys standing dea by one charcoal fire dey wen make, cuz was cold, an dey like come mo warm. An Peter, he wen stand dea too wit da odda guys, fo come warm.

19.verse: Da Head Priest Guy Aks Jesus Plenny Stuff - Den da Head Priest guy aks Jesus bout da guys he wen teach, an wat he teaching dem.

20.verse: Jesus tell him, “I wen talk wea everybody can hear me. Everytime I teach inside da Jewish churches an inside da temple yard. I neva say notting secret.

21.verse: How come you aksing me? Aks da peopo who wen hear me, wat I wen tell dem. Fo shua, dey know wat I wen say.”

22.verse: Afta dat, one police guy who was standing dea wen slap Jesus an say, “Eh! You not suppose to talk lidat to da Head Priest!”

23.verse: Jesus tell him, “If I wen talk bad, tell me wat I wen say was bad. But if was good, how come you wen go slap me?”

24.verse: Den Annas wen send him, all tie up, to da Head Priest guy, Kaiafas.

25.verse: Peter Say He Donno Jesus One Mo Time - Simon Peter, he still yet stay standing by da fire fo come warm. Da odda guys standing dea tell him, “Eh! You one a da guys Jesus wen teach, yeah?” Peter say, “No way! I not!”

26.verse: Had one nodda guy dea dat work fo da Head Priest an was ohana to da guy dat Peter wen cut off his ear. Da guy tell, “Eh! Dat was you inside da garden wit him, yeah?”

27.verse: One mo time Peter wen say, “No way! Not me!” Right den an dea, da roosta wen make noise.

28.verse: Jesus an Pilate - Den da guys dat work fo da Head Priest take Jesus away from Kaiafas place to da Rome army headquarters. Was early in da morning. But dey neva go inside da Rome guys place, cuz if dey do dat, bumbye dey no can eat da spesho food fo da Passova cuz jalike dey pilau.

29.verse: Den Governa Pilate wen go outside wea da Jews stay. He aks dem, “Wat you guys get agains dis guy?”

30.verse: Dey tell him, “If da bugga no was one crook, us guys no goin turn him ova to you.”

31.verse: Den Pilate tell dem, “Take him den an judge him jalike how yoa Rules say you gotta do.” Da priest guys tell Pilate, “Us guys no can do dat, cuz us guys no mo da right fo kill nobody da Rome way, on top one cross.”

32.verse: Wen dey say dat, da ting Jesus wen say befo wen come true. He wen tell his guys awready dat he goin mahke da Rome way on top one cross.

33.verse: Den Pilate go back inside da army headquarters, an he tell Jesus fo come inside, an tell him, “Eh, you! You da King fo da Jews, o wat?”

34.verse: Jesus tell him, “Dass wat you figga yoaself? O odda peopo wen tell you dat bout me?”

35.verse: Pilate tell, “Me? You tink I one Jew? Dass was yoa own peopo an da main priest guys wen bring you to me. Wat you wen do?”

36.verse: Jesus tell, “I not da kine king from dis world. If I was dat kine king, den my guys goin fight so da Jews no can take me. I one king, but no mo nobody hea inside dis world wen make me one king.”

37.verse: Pilate aks him, “So, you one king den?” Jesus tell him, “You wen say I one king. Az why I wen born, an az why I wen come hea inside da world -- so I can tell everyting dat I know bout da true stuff. Everybody dat stick wit da trut, dey listen to me.”

38.verse: Pilate aks him, “Wat da trut?” Dey Say, Jesus Gotta Mahke - Wen Pilate wen say dat, he wen go back outside to da Jews, an he tell dem, “I no find notting wrong wit dis guy.

39.verse: But you guys get dis ting wea I suppose to let one guy go at da Passova time. So, you guys like me let go da King fo da Jews, o wat?”

40.verse: Dey all yell an say, “Not dis guy! We like Barabbas!” Now, Barabbas, he was one mean crook guy.

1.verse: Da Army Guys Take Jesus - Den Governa Pilate tell his guys fo take Jesus an cut him up wit da whip.

2.verse: Da army guys wen twist togedda big kine thorn branches fo make one crown, an dey put um on top his head. Den dey put one purple kine robe on top him.

3.verse: An dey coming in front him, an tell, “Hui! King fo da Jews!” An dey slap his face wit dea hands.

4.verse: Den Pilate go outside one mo time, an tell everybody, “Eh, look! I goin bring him outside fo you guys, so you guys can know dat I neva find notting wrong fo punish him.”

5.verse: Jesus wen come outside wit da crown a thorns on top his head an da purple robe. Den Pilate tell da peopo, “Look, da guy!”

6.verse: Wen da main priest guys an da police guys see Jesus, dey make big noise, an dey yelling, “Kill him on top one cross! Kill him on top one cross!” Pilate tell um, “You guys take him an kill um on top one cross! I no find notting wrong fo punish him.”

7.verse: Da Jews tell Pilate, “Us guys get Rules from God, an da Rules say dis guy gotta mahke, cuz he wen go talk like he Godʼs Boy.”

8.verse: Governa Pilate Talk To Jesus - Wen Governa Pilate hear wat dey wen tell um, he come mo scared.

9.verse: He go back inside da army headquarters an aks Jesus, “Eh, you! Wea you come from?” But Jesus neva say notting.

10.verse: Den Pilate tell him, “You no like talk to me, o wat? Eh, you donno dat I get da right fo make dem kill you on top one cross, an I get da right fo let you go?”

11.verse: Jesus tell, “Ony one way you get da right fo hurt me. Ony if God Up Dea Inside Da Sky let you do all dis, den you can. Dass why da guy who wen turn me ova to you, he do mo worse ting den you.”

12.verse: From dat time, Pilate try fo let him go. But da Jews make big noise an yell, “If you let dis guy go, you not King Cesarʼs friend. If anybody make himself one king, he agains King Cesar.”

13.verse: So, wen Pilate hear da tings dey saying, he bring Jesus outside, an he sit down on top da judge chair by da place dey call “Stone Pavemen Square,” an da Jews call um “Gabbata.”

14.verse: Pilate Say Jesus Gotta Mahke - Was da Day Fo Make Ready Fo Da Passova. Bout noon time, Pilate tell da Jews, “Look now, yoa king!”

15.verse: But dey make big noise an yell, “Take um away! Take um away! Kill um on top one cross!” Pilate tell um, “Wot! You mean, yoa king, I gotta kill um?” Da main priest guys tell, “Us guys, we no mo no odda king, ony King Cesar!”

16.verse: Den Pilate turn ova Jesus fo da army guys kill um on top one cross. Dey Wen Nail Jesus to One Cross - So dey take charge a Jesus,

17.verse: an he wen carry his own cross outside da town, da place dey call “Da Skull Place,” an da Jews call um “Golgota,” dea language.

18.verse: Ova dea dey wen nail Jesus to one cross. Same ting fo two odda guys, one on top one cross on da left side, da odda one on top one nodda cross on da right side, an Jesus inside da middle.

19.verse: One nodda ting: Pilate wen tell da army guys fo make one sign an put um on top da cross. Da sign say, “JESUS FROM NAZARET, DA KING FO DA JEWS.”

20.verse: Dis sign, plenny Jews wen read um, cuz da place dey wen kill him stay near Jerusalem town. Da army guys wen write da sign in three language: Hebrew, Greek, an Latin.

21.verse: Da Jewish main priest guys tell Pilate, “Eh, no write, ‘Da King Fo Da Jews’! Mo betta write, ‘Dis guy wen say, I da King fo da Jews’.”

22.verse: Pilate tell um, “I wen tell my guys wat fo write, an dass how goin stay!”

23.verse: Da army guys, afta dey wen nail Jesus to da cross, dey take his clotheses an make four piles. Was one pile fo every army guy. Had his robe too, dat neva have seam, cuz dey wen weave um from da top an all ova.

24.verse: So dey say, “Mo betta no broke up da robe. We go throw da dice fo um, yeah? Fo find out who goin get um.” Dat was fo make happen jalike da Bible wen say from befo time: “Dey wen split my clotheses. An my robe, dey wen throw da dice fo um.” So dass wat da army guys wen do.

25.verse: Jesus Tell John Fo Take Care Jesus Mudda - Had Jesus mudda standing by da cross wit her sista, an Mary, Clopas wife, an Mary from Magdala.

26.verse: Jesus wen see his mudda standing dea, wit one guy he wen teach, da one he get plenny love an aloha fo. (Dass was me, you know.) So Jesus tell his mudda, “Look, Ma, dis yoa boy now.”

27.verse: Den Jesus tell me, “Look! Make like her yoa mudda now.” An I wen take her to my own place from dat time.

28.verse: Jesus Mahke - Afta dat, Jesus wen know dat he wen pau do everyting he suppose to do. Den fo make come true everyting da Bible wen say befo time, he say, “I thirsty!”

29.verse: Had one jug full a cheap wine ova dea. Dey fill up one sponge wit dat wine, put um on top one oregano branch, an put um up to his mout.

30.verse: Wen Jesus wen suck da cheap wine he say, “Everyting pau awready!” An he wen bend down his head, an den let go his spirit.

31.verse: Dey Stab Jesus - Was da Day Fo Make Everyting Ready Fo Da Passova. Da Jews neva like fo da mahke bodies fo stay on top da cross on da Rest Day. Dat Rest Day stay real spesho, so da leada guys wen go beg Pilate fo broke da guys legs fo kill um mo quick, so dey can take down da bodies.

32.verse: Da army guys wen go dea. Da two guys dey wen kill um on top da odda crosses same time wit Jesus, dey wen broke da first guyʼs legs, an den da odda guyʼs legs.

33.verse: But wen dey go by Jesus, dey see dat he mahke awready, so dey neva broke his legs.

34.verse: But one army guy wen stab him wit his spear on da side, an blood an water come out.

35.verse: (You know, one a da guys dat wen see all dat happen, dass me. I tell da tings I wen see, an I tell da trut. I know I telling true kine stuff, so you guys can trus wat I say.)

36.verse: All dis wen happen jalike da Bible wen say befo time, “Dey no goin broke even one bone.”

37.verse: An da Bible wen tell one nodda ting, “Dey goin look at him, da guy dey wen stab.”

38.verse: Dey Bury Jesus - Had one guy, name Joseph from Arimatea. He wen like learn plenny from Jesus, but he neva tell nobody, cuz he scared da Jewish leada guys. He wen go aks Pilate fo let him take Jesus body, an Pilate let him. So he go an take away Jesus body.

39.verse: Nicodemus, he go ova dea wit Joseph too. He da guy who befo time wen go by Jesus, nite time, fo talk to him. He wen bring aloe an myrrh, all mix up, bout hundred pounds, fo put on top Jesus body befo dey bury him.

40.verse: Dey wen take Jesus body an wrap um up inside linen kine cloth wit da aloe an myrrh inside, cuz dass how da Jews bury da mahke guys.

41.verse: Now da place dey wen kill Jesus, had one garden wit trees, an one new place fo bury dat da owna guy jus pau dig outa one cave, an dey neva put nobody inside dea yet.

42.verse: Dass wea dey put Jesus, cuz was da Day Da Jews Make Ready Fo Da Passova, an dat place stay near.

1.verse: Jesus Come Back Alive - Da first day in da week, Mary from Magdala wen come back to da place dey wen bury Jesus. She come dea wen dark time still yet. She wen see da big stone Jesus friends wen use fo close da place afta dey bury um. But now, da stone stay on da side.

2.verse: So she wen run ova dea wea Simon Peter wen stay, an me, da guy dat Jesus get love an aloha fo, I stay dea wit Peter. She wen tell us, “Dey wen take da Boss away! He no stay inside da place dey wen bury um! We donno wea dey wen put him!”

3.verse: So Peter an me wen run, fo go da place.

4.verse: Us guys wen run togedda, but me, I wen run mo fast, an come to da place first.

5.verse: I wen bend down, an look inside, an I spock all da linen kine cloths lying ova dea, da ones dey wen wrap Jesus inside. But I neva go inside da place dey wen bury Jesus.

6.verse: Den Simon Peter come afta. An he go inside da place dey wen bury Jesus, an see da cloths dey use fo wrap Jesus inside fo bury him. Da cloths lying ova dea too.

7.verse: He see da odda cloth dat was aroun Jesus head, all fold up on da odda side.

8.verse: Den me, dat wen come first, I wen go inside too. An I wen see um, an I wen believe wat Jesus wen say befo time, dat he goin come back alive.

9.verse: Cuz us guys still yet neva undastan dat da Bible say Jesus gotta come back alive from mahke.

10.verse: Den us two, Jesus guys, we wen go back da place we staying.

11.verse: Mary From Magdala See Jesus - Mary stay outside da place dey wen bury Jesus, an she crying. An wen she was still crying, she wen bend down, an look inside.

12.verse: She wen spock two angel guys wit white clotheses sitting ova dea wea Jesus body wen stay befo, one by wea da head wen stay, an da odda by wea da feet wen stay.

13.verse: Dey tell her, “Lady, how come you stay crying?” She tell dem, “Cuz dey wen take away my Boss, an I donno wea dey wen put um.”

14.verse: Afta she wen say dat, she wen turn aroun an see Jesus standing dea. But she neva know dat was Jesus.

15.verse: Jesus tell her, “Lady, how come you stay crying? Who you looking fo?” She wen tink he da yard man, an she tell him, “Mista, if you wen take him away, tell me wea you wen put him, an I goin take da body fo bury.”

16.verse: Jesus say, “Eh, Mary!” She wen turn aroun an say, “Rabboni!” Dass how da Jewish peopo say, “Eh, Teacha!”

17.verse: Jesus tell her, “No touch me, cuz I neva go up by my Fadda yet. But go by my brudda an sista guys an tell dem, I goin go up dea by my Fadda an yoa Fadda, an by my God an yoa God.”

18.verse: Den Mary from Magdala wen go an tell his guys, “Eh! I wen see da Boss Jesus!” Den she wen tell dem wat Jesus wen tell her.

19.verse: Jesus Guys See Him - Was da same day Sunday, da first day in da week, an da sun wen go down. Jesus guys wen stay togedda an da doors lock, cuz dey scared da Jews. Den Jesus wen show up in da middle a dem. He tell um, “Aloha! I like yoa hearts rest inside!”

20.verse: An wen Jesus say dat, he show dem da scars on top his hands an his side. An his guys wen come real good inside wen dey see dea Boss.

21.verse: Den Jesus tell dem again, “I like yoa hearts rest inside. Jalike my Fadda wen send me all ova, dass how I goin send you guys all ova.”

22.verse: Wen he say dat, he wen breathe on top dem, an say, “I giving you guys Godʼs Spesho Spirit. Take um.

23.verse: Whoeva do bad kine stuff, an you guys let um go, God goin let um go too. Whoeva do bad kine stuff, an you guys no let um go, God no goin let um go too.”

24.verse: Jesus an Thomas - One a Jesus twelve guys, Thomas, dey call him “Twin.” He neva stay ova dea wit dem wen Jesus wen come.

25.verse: Dass why da odda guys wen tell him, “Eh, us guys wen see da Boss, you know.” But he tell dem, “If I no see da puka from da nails inside Jesus hands, an put my finga inside da puka in his side, no way I goin believe he alive fo real kine!”

26.verse: One week lata da guys wen stay togedda again inside da house, an Thomas stay dea too. Da doors was shut, an Jesus wen show up in da middle a dem. An he say, “Aloha! I like yoa hearts rest inside.”

27.verse: Den he tell Thomas, “Put yoa finga ova hea an check out my hands. Put out yoa hand, an touch my side. Now, no say you no believe I alive fo real kine. Believe!”

28.verse: Den Thomas tell Jesus, “You, you my Boss! You my God!”

29.verse: Jesus tell him, “Thomas, cuz you wen see me, you believe I alive. Goin get peopo dat neva see me, but dey goin believe I alive too. Dey da ones goin stay good inside.”

30.verse: How Come Get Dis Book - Jesus wen do plenny odda awesome stuff fo show who him, but I neva write all dat inside dis book.

31.verse: But da tings I wen write, I write um so you guys goin believe dat Jesus da Christ guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, an he Godʼs Boy. Wen you guys trus him, you guys goin live foeva fo real kine cuz you his guys.

1.verse: Jesus Talk To His Guys - An den, afta dat, Jesus wen let his guys go see him again. Dis wen happen by Lake Tiberias. Dis wat wen happen.

2.verse: Some a Jesus guys wen get togedda. Had Simon Peter, an Thomas da guy dey call Da Twin, Natanael da guy from Cana town Galilee side, an Zebedeeʼs two boys, plus two odda guys. Jesus was dea teacha.

3.verse: Simon Peter wen tell da guys, “Eh, I like go fish!” An dey tell um, “Yeah! We like go too.” So da guys wen go down to da beach, an dey wen go inside one boat. But dat nite, dey neva catch notting.

4.verse: Den wen real early in da morning an get ony litto bit light, had Jesus standing dea on da beach. But his guys, dey neva know was him.

5.verse: He tell um, “Eh! Wat you guys wen catch?” Dey tell um, “Whitewash! No mo notting!”

6.verse: Den he tell um, “Go throw da net ova da right side! You goin get plenny fish dea!” Dey go throw da net, an get so plenny fish, da guys no can pull up da net.

7.verse: Now me, I was dea. I da guy dat Jesus wen get plenny love an aloha fo. I wen tell Peter, “Eh! Dass da Boss!” Wen Simon Peter wen hear dat, he put on his shirt dat he wen take off befo fo work, an den he go jump outa da boat fo swim quick to da beach,

8.verse: cuz da boat ony stay bout hundred yards from da beach. So den Jesus odda guys wen row da boat back to da beach, dragging da net wit all da fishes inside.

9.verse: Wen da guys wen go outa da boat, dey spock one charcoal fire on da beach. Had fish on top, an had bread.

10.verse: Jesus tell um, “Eh, bring some a da fish you wen catch ova hea.”

11.verse: So Simon Peter go back inside da boat, an he help da guys drag da net on top da beach. Had plenny big kine fishes inside -- was hundred fifty three! An you know wat? Da net neva even broke, no matta had so plenny fish inside.

12.verse: Jesus tell um, “Come on, you guys! Breakfas time awready!” His guys, dey know awready, was da Boss. An dey too scared fo aks him, “Who you?”

13.verse: Den Jesus wen go ova dea, an take da bread an give um to his guys. Same ting wit da fish.

14.verse: Az was three times Jesus wen let da guys see him afta he wen come back alive from mahke.

15.verse: Jesus an Peter - Afta dey pau eat, Jesus wen aks Simon Peter, “Eh Simon, Johnʼs boy. Tell me dis: You get mo plenny love an aloha fo me den dese guys get, o wat?” Peter tell um, “Eh, fo shua, Boss. You know I yoa friend.” An Jesus wen tell um, “Kay den. Feed my baby sheeps.”

16.verse: Den Jesus aks um one mo time, “Eh Simon, Johnʼs boy. You get love an aloha fo me, o wat?” Peter tell um, “Eh, fo shua, Boss! You know I yoa friend.” An Jesus tell um, “Kay den. Take care my sheeps.”

17.verse: An den one mo time, Jesus aks um, “Eh Simon, Johnʼs boy. You my friend, o wat?” Den Peter wen come all hurt inside, cuz now three times awready Jesus go aks him. He wen say, “You my friend, o wat?” So Peter tell um, “Boss! You know everyting! You know I yoa friend.” Jesus tell um “Feed my sheeps.

18.verse: You know wat I mean? Den I like tell you dis too: Befo time, wen you was one young guy, you used to put on yoa clotheses an tie yoa belt an go wea eva you like. Bumbye, you goin come one old guy. Den you goin stick out yoa hands an one nodda guy goin tie you up an take you one place you no like go.”

19.verse: (Jesus wen talk lidat fo tell Peter wat goin happen bumbye, how Peter goin mahke fo show how awesome God stay.) Den Jesus tell um, “Come on! Stay tight wit me an be my guy.”

20.verse: Da Guy Dat Jesus Love Plenny - Den Peter wen turn aroun, an spock me walking behind dem. I one a Jesus guys, da one Jesus get plenny love an aloha fo. I da guy dat wen sit by Jesus da time dey wen eat da Passova food, an wen aks Jesus, “Eh Boss, who da guy dat goin set you up fo mahke?”

21.verse: Wen Peter spock me, he wen aks Jesus, “Eh Boss! Wat bout dis guy? Wat goin happen to him?”

22.verse: Jesus tell um, “So, wat if I like him stay alive till I come back? Bodda you? You, you stay tight wit me!”

23.verse: Cuz a dat, Jesus odda guys telling each odda, “Dat guy John, he no goin mahke, eva.” But Jesus neva tell um dat I no goin mahke, eva. He ony say, “So, wat if I like fo da guy stay alive till I come back? Bodda you?”

24.verse: One Mo Ting - An you know who dat guy dat Jesus talk bout, yeah? Was me, John! Jesus, he my teacha. I telling you guys all dis stuff. I wen see um happen, an I wen write um all down. An we all know da stuff I stay telling you guys, dat stuff stay true.

25.verse: An get plenny mo odda kine stuff Jesus wen do. If somebody wen try write all dat Jesus wen do, from da time he wen start till pau, I figga da whole world no mo room fo put all da kine books bout um.
